name: next/13/replace-use-search-params
description: The codemod replaces getSearchParams with compatGetSearchParams

arguments.name: useCompatSearchParamsHookAbsolutePath
arguments.description: Absolute path of the hook that will be created by the codemod

arguments.name: useCompatSearchParamsHookRelativePath
arguments.description: Relative path of the hook that will be created by the codemod

arguments.name: useCompatSearchParamsHookModuleSpecifier
arguments.description: The string that will be used as ModuleSpecifier for the import desclarations that will be inserted (import { useCompatSearchParams } from 'useCompatSearchParamsHookModuleSpecifier')

arguments.name: hookModuleCreation
arguments.description: Whether to create the module (file) that contains the compatGetSearchParams hook or not
